meanings.definition: A type of glial cell in the central nervous system that produces myelin.
meanings.sent1: Oligodendroglia help protect nerve cells in the brain.
meanings.sent2: The oligodendroglia play a crucial role in insulating nerve fibers.
meanings.sent3: The oligodendroglia threw a myelin party in the brain.
meanings.sent4: The oligodendroglia are like the painters of the nervous system, adding colorful myelin strokes.
meanings.sent5: Imagine the oligodendroglia as tiny myelin factories working tirelessly in the brain.
